name: Zarlancer
description:
ASTEROIDS ACTION

Zarlancer is a top-down shooter inspired by Asteroids and retro shoot-em-ups, with a much more modern, action-oriented feel.

Shoot, weave, and dodge your way through asteroids and enemies while sustaining your score multiplier and grabbing power-ups.

A lot of care was put in to the movement system, sounds, music and art of this game. I hope you enjoy it! Game is not done by any means, but will probably be awhile before I work on it more.

CONTROLS

Best with a Gamepad but Keyboard is supported

D-Pad/WASD/ArrowsMoveCross/A/Space ShootSquare/X/CtrlDodgeRT/R2/ShiftLock DirectionStartPauseTriangle/Y While paused to Restart
